name: cc:Mail Archive File
summary: Learn about .CCA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: cc:Mail was acquired by Lotus and was incorporated into the Lotus Notes software. However, the CCA format is no longer supported. Microsoft provides a utility called "Exchange Server Importer for Lotus cc:Mail Archives," which can import CCA data into Outlook .PST files. The utility is also called "Microsoft Importer for Lotus cc:Mail Archives."
NOTE: Importer for Lotus ccMail Archives is no longer available for download from Microsoft.

description: File created by cc:Mail, an older email software for MS-DOS that is no longer used; contains email messages for an email account, including attachments; used for backing up email data.
